item.description:
Who wants to come, can be there at 6pm. I got my iPhone back so the ringer will be on close to my ears for those who want to attend. I'll be there at 5pm - 5:30pm.

The first 2 that comes in early can go and start a line for us. I have 15 passes with me.


We can all head up the escalators at 6:30pm



Safety Never Takes a Holiday



Direct number 617-435-8177
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby area at 5pm wearing a blue cap with the initials JP in red
item.name: Safety Never Takes a Holiday - Advance Screening
